amendment.description: To provide for the treatment by the Department of Energy of waste material.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3170 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3170 proposed by Senator Graham SC. (consideration: CR S5903-5907, S5909-5925; text: CR S5903) To provide for the treatment by the Department of Energy of waste material.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3170 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
